mapper.select: SELECT PN_MNT_RT_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NM, PN_CARR, PN_NET_TYPE, PN_MNT_AMT, PN_MNT_CALL, PN_MNT_DATA, PN_MNT_SMS from TBL010 t where PN_CARR = #{mntCarr} and PN_NET_TYPE IN ( '4G', '5G') ORDER BY PN_NET_TYPE DESC, convert(PN_MNT_AMT, decimal) desc

SELECT *, CONCAT(t.PN_MDL_NM," ", t.PN_STOR, "GB") as label FROM TBL011 t WHERE t.PN_CARR LIKE CONCAT('%' #{mntCarr}, '%') AND t.PN_MKR = #{pnMkr} AND t.PN_NET_TYPE = #{pnNetType} group by t.PN_MDL_NO, t.PN_STOR order by t.REL_DT desc, t.PN_MDL_NO, convert(t.PN_STOR, decimal), convert(t.PN_MSRP, decimal) desc
mapper.insert: INSERT into TBL006 values( (SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE() , '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(DEAL_NO,9)),0)+1,4,0), '')) as DEAL_NO FROM TBL006 as t WHERE DEAL_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'),'%')), 'R', #{dealLoc}, #{dealDt}, #{pnRegDis}, #{saleType}, #{dealReq}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{clMbrId}, #{mntCarr}, #{pnMntRtNo}, #{pnMdlNo}, #{pnStor} )
